news_header: A$AP Rocky found not guilty of gun charges.
news_original_title: A$AP Rocky not guilty of firearm assault on LA street
news_text: Rapper A$AP Rocky was acquitted of firing a gun at a former friend after a jury trial in Los Angeles. The charges stemmed from an altercation in November 2021, where his former friend claimed Rocky shot at him. The defense argued it was a prop gun. Rocky expressed gratitude after the verdict.
